title: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby - BNW no Chikai
title_japanese: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー BNWの誓い
synopsis: Special episodes included with the fourth volume of Uma Musume: Pretty Derby Blu-ray release.
opening_themes: "Make Debut!" by Special Week (Azumi Waki), Silence Suzuka (Marika Kouno), Toukai Teio (Machico), Vodka (Ayaka Ohashi), Daiwa Scarlet (Chise Kimura), Gold Ship (Hitomi Ueda), Mejiro McQueen (Saori Oonishi)
ending_themes: #1: "Glow Up Shine! (グロウアップ・シャイン！)" by Special Week (Azumi Waki), Silence Suzuka (Kouno Marika), Toukai Teio (Machico), Vodka (Ohashi Ayaka), Daiwa Scarlet (Kimura Chise), Gold Ship (Ueda Hitomi), Mejiro McQueen (Oonishi Saori) (ep

#2: "Enjoy and Join" by Mihono Bourbon(Hasegawa Ikumi), Seiun Sky (Akari Kitou), Agnes Tachyon (Uesaka Sumire), T.M. Opera O (Sora Tokui), Air Shakur (Tsuda Minami), Gold Sheep (Hitomi Ueda), Narita Taishin (Watanabe Keiko) (ep 3)
